content: Hello dear BitcoinTalk Community,Livecasino.io is back again with another awesome Promo, this time for 1 mBTC free bet for Evolution Crazy Time!!!Livecasino.io BitcoinTalk Promo#19 will work like this:Reward1 mBTC in free bets on Evolution Crazy Time game!How?Opt-in by sending  PM with your livecasino.io username (please use BitcoinTalk promo #19 as PM subject to facilitate the management)Make at least 1 depositWager at least 10 mBTC on any games at Livecasino.ioPromo durationThis Promo will be running from the time of this post to Sunday 19th June, 23:59 GMTRulesAll BitcoinTalk users can participateMulti accounts will not be eligible for the reward The reward will be credited to the livecasino.io accounts on Monday 20th March, 17:00 GMTFree bet has 1x wagering requirementAll bets and winnings will be withdrawable from the freebetNormal livecasino.io terms and conditions still applyDue to Game Providers country restrictions, some participants may have to receive a different, but equivalent rewardWe hope you enjoy!Flávio from livecasino.io team
